segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī, at the Great Wood, in the hall with the peaked roof.

segments.pli: Atha kho aññataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so vajjiputtako bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then a certain Vajji monk went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him:
“Sir, each fortnight over a hundred and fifty training rules are recited.
I’m not able to train in them.”

segments.pli: “Sakkhissasi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhituṃ—
segments.en: “But monk, are you able to train in three trainings:
the higher ethics, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom?”
“So, monk, you should train in these three trainings:
the higher ethics, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom.

segments.pli: Yato kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, adhisīlampi sikkhissasi, adhicittampi sikkhissasi, adhipaññampi sikkhissasi, tassa tuyhaṃ bhikkhu adhisīlampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipaññampi sikkhato rāgo pahīyissati, doso pahīyissati, moho pahīyissati.
segments.en: As you train in these, you will give up greed, hate, and delusion.

segments.pli: So tvaṃ rāgassa pahānā dosassa pahānā mohassa pahānā yaṃ akusalaṃ na taṃ karissasi, yaṃ pāpaṃ na taṃ sevissasī”ti.
segments.en: Then you won’t do anything unskillful, or practice anything bad.”

segments.pli: Atha kho so bhikkhu aparena samayena adhisīlampi sikkhi, adhicittampi sikkhi, adhipaññampi sikkhi.
segments.en: After some time that monk trained in the higher ethics, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom.

segments.pli: Tassa adhisīlampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipaññampi sikkhato rāgo pahīyi, doso pahīyi, moho pahīyi.
segments.en: He gave up greed, hate, and delusion.

segments.pli: So rāgassa pahānā dosassa pahānā mohassa pahānā yaṃ akusalaṃ taṃ nākāsi, yaṃ pāpaṃ taṃ na sevīti.
segments.en: Then he didn’t do anything unskillful, or practice anything bad.
